scripts.start:dev: set NODE_ENV=development && concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.server:dev: set NODE_ENV=development && cd backend && nodemon server.js
scripts.client:dev: set NODE_ENV=development && cd frontend && npm run dev
scripts.start:prod: set NODE_ENV=production && concurrently "cd backend && run server" "cd frontend && npm run client"
scripts.server:prod: set NODE_ENV=production && cd backend && nodemon server.js
scripts.client:prod: set NODE_ENV=production && cd frontend && npm run dev
